main
Interface Annotable

All Known Subinterfaces:
DESModel, FSAModel
All Known Implementing Classes:
Automaton
public interface Annotable

Interface for objects which can be dynamically annotated by other parts of the code. The intended use is mainly to allow plugins to annotate models and their elemets.

Author:
Lenko Grigorov

Field Summary
static String COMPOSED_OF
          Annotation key for the ids of the elements of which an element is composed.
static String FILE
          Annotation key for the file (of models).

          Returns the annotation for the given key.

          Returns true if there is an annotation for the given key.

          Sets an annotation for a given key.

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getAnnotation

Object getAnnotation(String key)
Returns the annotation for the given key.

Parameters:
key - key for the annotation
Returns:
if there is no annotation for the given key, returns null, otherwise returns the annotation for the key

setAnnotation

void setAnnotation(String key,
                   Object annotation)
Sets an annotation for a given key. If there is already an annotation for the key, it is replaced.

Parameters:
key - the key for the annotation
annotation - the annotation

hasAnnotation

boolean hasAnnotation(String key)
Returns true if there is an annotation for the given key. Otherwise returns false.

Parameters:
key - key for the annotation
Returns:
true if there is an annotation for the given key, false otherwise
